name: VIR-273.06 Verify that if all colors are deselected the base color is not allowed to the business unit/school, the model with base color is not shown to the shopper from this unit/school

userStory.narrative:
As a Chief shopper, I require the ability to manage the colors
that each school will be able to view and purchase on the shop.virco
so that I can control the consistency for the school.

title: VIR-273.06 Verify that if all colors are deselected the base color is not allowed to the business unit/school, the model with base color is not shown to the shopper from this unit/school
